mapper.insert: insert into t_grid_manager (id, code, `name`, sex, area_code, area_name, mobile, grid_code, grid_name, logo_src) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gridCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gridName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logoSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_grid_manager set code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, grid_code = #{gridCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grid_name = #{gridName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo_src = #{logoSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, `name`, sex, area_code, area_name, mobile, grid_code, grid_name, logo_src from t_grid_manager where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
